targets.rawSql:
select  address, count(*) as Anzahl, max(StartDate) as LetzteLadung, sum(cost_total) as Cost, 
(
  select sum(cost_total) / sum(chargingstate.charge_energy_added) as cost
  FROM chargingstate join pos as pos2 on chargingstate.pos = pos2.id join charging on chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging.id
  where pos2.address = T1.address and cost_total is not null and chargingstate.carid=$Car
) as 'Ø Price / kWh', 
(
  select sum(chargingstate.charge_energy_added) / sum(cost_kwh_meter_invoice) * 100 as eff
  FROM chargingstate join pos as pos3 on chargingstate.pos = pos3.id join charging on chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging.id and chargingstate.carid=$Car
  where pos3.address = T1.address and cost_kwh_meter_invoice is not null
) as 'Eff', 
sum(charge_energy_added) as geladen_kWh, avg(charge_energy_added) as avg_geladen_kWh, sum(co2_g_kWh * charge_energy_added / 1000) as "CO2 kg" ,sum(charge_energy_added) / sum(MinuteDiff) * 60 as avg_kW, avg(End_battery_level) as AvgSOC, max(End_battery_level) as MaxSOC, sum(MinuteDiff) / 60 as LadezeitStunden, 
avg(lat) as lat, avg(lng) as lng 
from 
(
SELECT        pos.lat, pos.lng,cost_total, chargingstate.StartDate as StartDate, pos.address, 
              chargingstate.charge_energy_added, co2_g_kWh,
              charging_End.ideal_battery_range_km AS EndSOC,
              charging_End.battery_level as End_battery_level,
              TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) as MinuteDiff
FROM            charging inner JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID INNER JOIN
                         pos ON chargingstate.pos = pos.id 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         charging AS charging_End ON chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging_End.id
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3 and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 4  and chargingstate.carid=$Car
) as T1
group by address
order by Anzahl desc

SELECT ROUND(battery_level / 5,0) * 5 as SOC, count(*) as anz FROM chargingstate join charging on chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging.id
where $__timeFilter(StartDate) and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3 and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 4 and chargingstate.carid=$Car
group by ROUND(battery_level / 5,0) * 5
order by SOC desc

SELECT ROUND(battery_level / 5,0) * 5 as SOC, count(*) as Anzahl FROM chargingstate join charging on chargingstate.StartChargingID = charging.id
where $__timeFilter(StartDate) and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3 and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 4 and chargingstate.carid=$Car
group by ROUND(battery_level / 5,0) * 5
order by SOC

SELECT        chargingstate.StartDate as time,chargingstate.charge_energy_added
FROM            charging inner JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         charging AS charging_End ON chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging_End.id
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3 and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 4 and chargingstate.carid=$Car

SELECT        chargingstate.StartDate as time, 
              TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) / 60 as HourDiff
FROM            charging inner JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         charging AS charging_End ON chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging_End.id
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3 and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 4 and chargingstate.carid=$Car

SELECT        chargingstate.StartDate as time,count(*)
FROM            charging inner JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         charging AS charging_End ON chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging_End.id
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3 and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 4 and chargingstate.carid=$Car

SELECT sum(chargingstate.charge_energy_added)
FROM            charging inner JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID INNER JOIN
                         pos ON chargingstate.pos = pos.id 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         charging AS charging_End ON chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging_End.id
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and chargingstate.carid=$Car and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3 and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 4 and
(fast_charger_present = 0 or 
(fast_charger_present is null and (address not like '%supercharger%' or address not like '%ionity%') and (charging_End.charge_energy_added / TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) * 60) < 23 )
)

SELECT sum(chargingstate.charge_energy_added)
FROM            charging inner JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID INNER JOIN
                         pos ON chargingstate.pos = pos.id 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         charging AS charging_End ON chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging_End.id
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and chargingstate.carid=$Car and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3 and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 4 and
(fast_charger_present = 1 or 
(fast_charger_present is null and address like '%supercharger%') or
(fast_charger_present is null and (charging_End.charge_energy_added / TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) * 60) > 23) 
)

SELECT sum(CASE WHEN meter_vehicle_kwh_sum - meter_utility_kwh_sum > 0 THEN meter_vehicle_kwh_sum - meter_utility_kwh_sum else 0 end)
FROM            charging inner JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID INNER JOIN
                         pos ON chargingstate.pos = pos.id 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         charging AS charging_End ON chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging_End.id
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and chargingstate.carid=$Car and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3 and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 4 and
(fast_charger_present = 0 or 
(fast_charger_present is null and (address not like '%supercharger%' or address not like '%ionity%') and (charging_End.charge_energy_added / TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) * 60) < 23 )
)

SELECT        chargingstate.StartDate as time, 
              charging.battery_level AS 'Start SOC %', 
              charging_End.battery_level as 'End SOC %'
FROM            charging inner JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         charging AS charging_End ON chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging_End.id
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and chargingstate.carid=$Car and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3 and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 4
order by StartDate desc

SELECT sum(chargingstate.charge_energy_added)
FROM            charging inner JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID INNER JOIN
                         pos ON chargingstate.pos = pos.id 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         charging AS charging_End ON chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging_End.id
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3 and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 4 and 
address like '%supercharger%' and chargingstate.carid=$Car

SELECT sum(chargingstate.charge_energy_added)
FROM            charging inner JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID INNER JOIN
                         pos ON chargingstate.pos = pos.id 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         charging AS charging_End ON chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging_End.id
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3 and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 4 and
(fast_charger_type = 'Combo') and address not like '%supercharger%' and chargingstate.carid=$Car

SELECT sum(chargingstate.charge_energy_added)
FROM            charging inner JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID INNER JOIN
                         pos ON chargingstate.pos = pos.id 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         charging AS charging_End ON chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging_End.id
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3 and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 4 and
(fast_charger_type = 'CHAdeMO') and chargingstate.carid=$Car

SELECT sum(chargingstate.cost_freesuc_savings_total)
FROM            charging inner JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID INNER JOIN
                         pos ON chargingstate.pos = pos.id 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         charging AS charging_End ON chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging_End.id
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and chargingstate.carid=$Car

SELECT $__time(datum), val 
FROM can
WHERE $__timeFilter(datum) and id = 11 and carid=$Car
ORDER BY datum DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT $__time(datum), val 
FROM can
WHERE $__timeFilter(datum) and id = 9 and carid=$Car
ORDER BY datum DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT chargingstate.StartDate as time, cost_total 
FROM chargingstate 
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3 
and EndChargingID - StartChargingID > 4 and carid=$Car
and (cost_currency in ('eur','€','',' ') or isnull(cost_currency))

SELECT max(chargingstate.StartDate) as time ,sum(cost_total) / sum(chargingstate.charge_energy_added) as value
FROM chargingstate 
join charging on chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging.id
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3 
and EndChargingID - StartChargingID > 4 and chargingstate.carid=$Car
and (cost_currency in ('eur','€','',' ') or isnull(cost_currency))

SELECT        chargingstate.StartDate as time,charging_End.charge_energy_added
FROM            charging inner JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         charging AS charging_End ON chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging_End.id
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3 and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 4 and chargingstate.carid=$Car
and isnull(cost_total)

list.definition: select display_name as __text, id as __value from cars where length(vin) > 5 order by display_name
list.label: Fahrzeug
list.name: Car
list.query: select display_name as __text, id as __value from cars where length(vin) > 5 order by display_name
